record.query: SELECT "grape".schedule.process_id, schedule_id, pg_function, "grape".schedule.param, "grape".schedule.user_id, process_type, function_schema, start_function_name, start_function_schema, error_function_name, error_function_schema, end_function_name, end_function_schema FROM "grape".schedule JOIN "grape".process USING (process_id) WHERE time_started IS NULL AND time_sched <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND "grape".schedule.process_id NOT IN (SELECT ss.process_id FROM "grape".schedule AS ss WHERE ss.time_ended IS NULL AND ss.time_started IS NOT NULL AND ss.schedule_id != "grape".schedule.schedule_id) ORDER BY schedule_id LIMIT 1
